== Introduction ==
If you have installed Ubuntu and wanted to try Kubuntu by installing kubuntu-desktop or Xubuntu by installing xubuntu-desktop and have now changed your mind and want to go back to a default Ubuntu Gnome install, you should follow these instructions.

== Automated Removal ==
Open a terminal '''Applications → Accessories → Terminal''' and enter this command
<pre>
sudo aptitude remove kubuntu-desktop
</pre>
That should show a large list of package to remove, just press ''y'' and enter to continue. If that doesn't remove all the KDE packages then proceed to the manual removal section.

== Automated Removal ==
Open a terminal '''Applications → Accessories → Terminal''' and enter this command
<pre>
sudo aptitude remove xubuntu-desktop
</pre>
That should show a large list of package to remove, just press ''y'' and enter to continue. If that doesn't remove all the KDE packages then proceed to the manual removal section.

===== Older versions =====

To get a Pure Gnome desktop in older versions of Ubuntu go to the following links

Ubuntu 11.04 go <nowiki>[[http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnomenatty|Here]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu 10.10 go <nowiki>[[http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnomemaverick|Here]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu 10.04 go <nowiki>[[http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnomelucid|Here]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu 9.10 go <nowiki>[[http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnomekarmic|Here]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu 9.04 go <nowiki>[[http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnomejaunty|Here]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu 8.10 go <nowiki>[[http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnomeintrepid|Here]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu 8.10 is EOL. End-Of-Life is the time when security updates for an Ubuntu release stop, see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Releases|Releases]]</nowiki> for more information. Looking to upgrade from an EOL release? See <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/EOLUpgrades|EOLUpgrades]]</nowiki>

Ubuntu 8.04 go <nowiki>[[http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnomehardy|Here]]</nowiki>

To get a pure Kubuntu install you can go to the this page <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/PureKDE|PureKDE]]</nowiki>
